entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:12 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
